name: 4X4 Off
description: Climb aboard and get ready for an awe-inspiring trip to discover the real Jamaica. On safari through the rugged interior, your eyes will feast on breathtaking natural beauty and you’ll learn about the island’s rich history and unique culture. There are stops at several local landmarks, including a former slave hospital, which was converted into a church in 1846. We’ll take you for a walk on the wild side through lush, tropical foliage to discover hidden waterfalls and jump into crystal-clear, spring water pools. Get off the beaten track and experience the very heart of paradise.
